item.title: These retailers can ride out a recession best because of 'membership lock-in,' says Bernstein
item.description: Bernstein's view comes amid weaker-than-expected consumer confidence data reported on Tuesday.

item.title: Elon Musk's politics are not the main reason Tesla's sales are hurting, says Piper Sandler
item.description: The firm reiterated its overweight rating and price target suggesting upside of more than 60%.

item.title: This home improvement stock could see a rebound. An options trade to take advantage
item.description: The stock is now beginning to show signs of mean reversion, suggesting a potential rebound may be underway.

item.title: Bank of America double upgrades what it says is an underappreciated AI play
item.description: The bank issued a rare double upgrade, taking the cybersecurity company to buy from underperform.
